Entry.JapaneseText: 心を鎮めるお薬はラジルダにあると 聞きましたけど……本当かどうか……
Entry.EnglishText: Even though I've heard of a medicine from Razilda that can stabilize one's mind, I'm not sure if it actually exists...

Entry.JapaneseText: 他にはあてはないんだ。行くっきゃない。 ラジルダへはバルカ港から船だったな。急ごうぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: We have no other options. We'll have to take a boat from Balka Harbor to Razilda and see for ourselves. Let's hurry!
